00025 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00026                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00027 {
00028     if (nlhs>1)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00030     
00031     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00032     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00033     int id = 0;
00034     string method;
00035     if (nrhs==0) {
00036         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00037         obj_[++last_id] = KalmanFilter();
00038         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00039         return;
00040     }
00041     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00042         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00043         method = rhs[1].toString();
00044     }
00045     else
00046         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00047     
00048     // Big operation switch
00049     KalmanFilter& obj = obj_[id];
00050     if (method == "delete") {
00051         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00052             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00053         obj_.erase(id);
00054     }
00055     else if (method == "init") {
00056         if (nrhs<4 || (nrhs%2)!=0 || nlhs!=0)
00057             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00058         int dynamParams=rhs[2].toInt();
00059         int measureParams=rhs[3].toInt();
00060         int controlParams=0;
00061         int type=CV_64F;
00062         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00063             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00064             if (key=="ControlParams")
00065                 controlParams = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00066             else if (key=="type")
00067                 type = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00068             else
00069                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00070         }
00071         obj.init(dynamParams,measureParams,controlParams,type);
00072     }
00073     else if (method == "predict") {
00074         if ((nrhs%2)!=0)
00075             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00076         Mat control;
00077         for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00078             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00079             if (key=="Control")
00080                 control = rhs[i+1].toMat();
00081             else
00082                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00083         }
00084         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.predict(control));
00085     }
00086     else if (method == "correct") {
00087         if (nrhs!=3)
00088             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00089         Mat measurement(rhs[2].toMat());
00090         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.correct(measurement));
00091     }
00092     else if (method == "statePre") {
00093         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00094             obj.statePre = rhs[2].toMat();
00095         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00096             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.statePre);
00097         else
00098             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00099     }
00100     else if (method == "statePost") {
00101         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00102             obj.statePost = rhs[2].toMat();
00103         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00104             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.statePost);
00105         else
00106             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00107     }
00108     else if (method == "transitionMatrix") {
00109         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00110             obj.transitionMatrix = rhs[2].toMat();
00111         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00112             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.transitionMatrix);
00113         else
00114             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00115     }
00116     else if (method == "controlMatrix") {
00117         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00118             obj.controlMatrix = rhs[2].toMat();
00119         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00120             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.controlMatrix);
00121         else
00122             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00123     }
00124     else if (method == "measurementMatrix") {
00125         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00126             obj.measurementMatrix = rhs[2].toMat();
00127         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00128             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.measurementMatrix);
00129         else
00130             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");

00133         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)

00135         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)

00143         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00144             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.measurementNoiseCov);
00145         else
00146             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00147     }

00149         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00150             obj.errorCovPre = rhs[2].toMat();
00151         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00152             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.errorCovPre);

00157         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00158             obj.gain = rhs[2].toMat();

00167         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
